channel.title: Diamonds on AIXWIM
channel.description: Recent content in Diamonds on AIXWIM

item.title: How Diamond Prices Are Determined: Understanding the Factors That Affect Diamond Value
item.description: Learn how diamond prices are determined, from the cost of rough diamonds to the final retail price, and the role of certification and grading.

item.title: All About Diamond Clarity: Understanding Grades and Imperfections
item.description: Learn how diamond clarity is graded, what the grades mean, and how clarity impacts a diamond's value and appearance.

item.title: Understanding Diamond Weights: Carats, Grains, and CTW
item.description: Learn how diamonds are measured, the history behind carat weights, and essential tips for buying diamond jewelry.
